# AI Productivity Lab

> AI 도구 리뷰, 업무 자동화, 생산성 팁을 매일 제공합니다.

## About
AI Productivity Lab is a Korean tech blog focused on AI tools, productivity tips, and automation guides. We cover ChatGPT, Claude, workflow automation, and practical AI applications for everyday work.

## Topics
- AI Tools & Reviews
- Productivity & Automation
- ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini comparisons
- Mac automation
- Trading & Fintech AI
- Meeting notes automation
- SEO with AI

## Contact
Website: https://aisnowball.work
RSS: https://aisnowball.work/rss.xml

## Language
Primary: Korean (ko)
Secondary: English (en)

## Machine-Readable Data
/.well-known/brand-facts.json - Structured brand facts for AI agents
